verses.verse: "Do not <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you be <S%G2919>judged.<s%>
"For in the <S%G2917>way<s%> you <S%G2919>judge,<s%> you will be <S%G2919>judged;<s%> and by your <S%G3358>standard<s%> of <S%G3354>measure,<s%> it will be <S%G3354>measured<s%> to you.

"And <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G991>look<s%> at the <S%G2595>speck<s%> that is in your brother's <S%G3788>eye,<s%> but do not <S%G2657>notice<s%> the <S%G1385>log<s%> that is in your own <S%G3788>eye<s%>?

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> can you <S%G3004>say<s%> to your <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G863>'Let<s%> me <S%G1544>take<s%> the <S%G2595>speck<s%> out of your <S%G3788>eye,<s%>' and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G1385>log<s%> is in your own <S%G3788>eye<s%>?

"You <S%G5273>hypocrite,<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1544>take<s%> the <S%G1385>log<s%> out of your own <S%G3788>eye,<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> you will <S%G1227>see<s%> <S%G1227>clearly<s%> to <S%G1544>take<s%> the <S%G2595>speck<s%> out of your brother's <S%G3788>eye.<s%>

"Do not <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%> to <S%G2965>dogs,<s%> and do not <S%G906>throw<s%> your <S%G3135>pearls<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G5519>swine,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G2662>trample<s%> them <S%G2662>under<s%> their <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G4762>turn<s%> and <S%G4486>tear<s%> you to <S%G4486>pieces.<s%>
<S%G154>"Ask,<s%> and it shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> to you; <S%G2212>seek,<s%> and you shall <S%G2147>find;<s%> <S%G2925>knock,<s%> and it shall be <S%G455>opened<s%> to you.
"For <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G154>asks<s%> <S%G2983>receives,<s%> and he who <S%G2212>seeks<s%> <S%G2147>finds,<s%> and to him who <S%G2925>knocks<s%> it shall be <S%G455>opened.<s%>

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is there <S%G1537>among<s%> you, <S%G3739>when<s%> his <S%G5207>son<s%> shall <S%G154>ask<s%> him for a <S%G740>loaf,<s%> will <S%G1929>give<s%> him a <S%G3037>stone<s%>?
<S%G2228>"Or<s%> <S%G2532>if<s%> he shall <S%G154>ask<s%> for a <S%G2486>fish,<s%> he will not <S%G1929>give<s%> him a <S%G3789>snake,<s%> will he?

<S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1390>gifts<s%> to your <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall your <S%G3962>Father<s%> who is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> what is <S%G18>good<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G154>ask<s%> Him!

<S%G3767>"Therefore,<s%> <S%G3956>however<s%> <S%G3745><s%> you <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> to <S%G4160>treat<s%> you, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>treat<s%> them, for <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3551>Law<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets.<s%>

<S%G1525>"Enter<s%> by the <S%G4728>narrow<s%> <S%G4439>gate;<s%> for the <S%G4439>gate<s%> is <S%G4116>wide,<s%> and the <S%G3598>way<s%> is <S%G2149>broad<s%> that <S%G520>leads<s%> to <S%G684>destruction,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> are <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1525>enter<s%> by it.

"For the <S%G4439>gate<s%> is <S%G4728>small,<s%> and the <S%G3598>way<s%> is <S%G2346>narrow<s%> that <S%G520>leads<s%> to <S%G2222>life,<s%> and <S%G3641>few<s%> are <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2147>find<s%> it.

<S%G4337>"Beware<s%> of the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to you in sheep's <S%G1742>clothing,<s%> but <S%G2081>inwardly<s%> are <S%G727>ravenous<s%> <S%G3074>wolves.<s%>

"You will <S%G1921>know<s%> them by their <S%G2590>fruits.<s%> <S%G4718>Grapes<s%> are not <S%G4816>gathered<s%> from <S%G173>thorn<s%> [bushes,] <S%G2228>nor<s%> <S%G4810>figs<s%> from <S%G5146>thistles,<s%> are they?

"Even <S%G3779>so,<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4160>bears<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit;<s%> but the <S%G4550>bad<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4160>bears<s%> <S%G4190>bad<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>

"A <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5342>produce<s%> <S%G4190>bad<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> can a <S%G4550>bad<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G5342>produce<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>
<S%G3956>"Every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> that does not <S%G4160>bear<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>down<s%> and <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
<S%G1065>"So<s%> <S%G686>then,<s%> you will <S%G1921>know<s%> them by their <S%G2590>fruits.<s%>

"Not <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G3004>says<s%> to Me, <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>' will <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> but he who <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of My <S%G3962>Father<s%> who is in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G4183>"Many<s%> will <S%G3004>say<s%> to Me on that <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> did we not <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> in Your <S%G3686>name,<s%> and in Your <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons,<s%> and in Your <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G4160>perform<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%>?'
"And <S%G5119>then<s%> I will <S%G3670>declare<s%> to them, 'I <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> you; <S%G672>depart<s%> from Me, you who <S%G2038>practice<s%> <S%G458>lawlessness.<s%>'

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G1473>Mine,<s%> and <S%G4160>acts<s%> upon them, may be <S%G3666>compared<s%> to a <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3618>built<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> upon the <S%G4073>rock.<s%>

"And the <S%G1028>rain<s%> <S%G2597>descended,<s%> and the <S%G4215>floods<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and the <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G4154>blew,<s%> and <S%G4363>burst<s%> <S%G4363>against<s%> that <S%G3614>house;<s%> and [yet] it did not <S%G4098>fall,<s%> for it had been <S%G2311>founded<s%> upon the <S%G4073>rock.<s%>

"And <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G1473>Mine,<s%> and does not <S%G4160>act<s%> upon them, will be <S%G3666>like<s%> a <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3618>built<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> upon the <S%G285>sand.<s%>

"And the <S%G1028>rain<s%> <S%G2597>descended,<s%> and the <S%G4215>floods<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and the <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G4154>blew,<s%> and <S%G4350>burst<s%> <S%G4350>against<s%> that <S%G3614>house;<s%> and it <S%G4098>fell,<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> was its <S%G4431>fall.<s%>"

The <S%G1096>result<s%> was that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G1605>amazed<s%> at His <S%G1322>teaching;<s%>
for He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> them as [one] <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> and not as their <S%G1122>scribes.<s%>
